Package application.logic

Class GameManager

java.lang.Object
application.logic.GameManager
public class GameManager extends Object
GameManager is the class that control gameplay state. It start with initialize share objects, then the level, player, game root, and so on. The scene that controls gameplay state can call a public static method called update which check all the thing that happen within one frame.
Author:
Mos

  • Constructor Details

    • GameManager

      public GameManager()

  • Method Details

    • update

      public static void update()
      This method will be called everytimes GameScene's animation timer is running. Basically, this method will check everything happends within a frame, like, moving methods, player's update method, item collecting methods, and win or lose condition checking algorithms.

    • setUpNextLevel

      public static void setUpNextLevel()
      This method is called when the player has finished a level. This method will reset everything that need to be resetted, which, some of the methods are the same in the constructor. All you need to focus is that after calling this method, the next level is ready to be played.

    • makeJumpHigh

      public static void makeJumpHigh()
      A method that is used to increase jumpBonus by 1, if jumpBonus is more than or equal to 5, it will be set to 5

    • makeRunFast

      public static void makeRunFast()
      A method that is used to increase speedBonus by 1, if speedBonus is more than or equal to 5, it will be set to 5

    • upgradePlayerMaxHP

      public static void upgradePlayerMaxHP()
      A method that is used to increase player's max HP by a number between 30 to 50.

    • upgradeMapTime

      public static void upgradeMapTime()
      A method that is used to increase timeMap by a number between 0 to 20.

      public static void updateLeaderboard()
